DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy ABT-652 combination Non-steroidal Anti-inflammatory Drug ( NSAID ) compare NSAID alone adult osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee .
DOC.brief_title: A Study ABT-652 Combination With Nonsteroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drug ( NSAID ) Adults With Osteoarthritis Pain Knee
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize withdrawal design study , contain 4 week open-label period follow 6 week double-blind period . The total treatment period 10 week .
DOC.criteria: History osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee joint meeting American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) Clinical Radiographic criterion , Currently take nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) still experience pain per protocol requirement . Willing washout analgesic follow treatment plan , visit schedule study procedure . Diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis , autoimmune disorder , arthritis osteoarthritis involve study joint , painful syndrome could interfere assessment pain study joint Any cardiac , respiratory , neurological , psychiatric disorder medical condition illness well control treatment
